titlePart.text: Devices for securing together, or preventing relative movement between, constructional elements or machine parts
titlePart.entryReference: the following groups in this sub-class take precedence

noteParagraph.text: Heads of screws or bolts are put on a par with nuts as far as pertains to locking; an object into which a screw is threaded is put on a par with a nut.
